level.heading: Enforcement of subpoena.
level.text: The Superior Court of the District of Columbia may, upon petition by the Ethics Board, in case of refusal to obey a subpoena or order of the Ethics Board issued under ยง 1-1162.11(3), issue an order requiring compliance; and any failure to obey the order of the court may be treated by the court as contempt.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-124
level.text: For history of Law 19-124, see notes under ยง 1-1161.01.
